      public Camera setApertureSize(double size)
      setting the aperture size as the given parameter, and initialize the points array.
      Parameters:
      size - the given parameter.
      Returns:
      the camera itself for farther initialization.

    • setNumOfRays

      public Camera setNumOfRays(int numOfRays)
      This function sets the number of rays to be casted by the camera and returns the camera object.
      Parameters:
      numOfRays - The number of rays that will be casted from the camera to the scene.
      Returns:
      The camera object itself.

    • constructRayAnalising

      public List<Ray> constructRayAnalising(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      The function constructs a list of rays through the center of the pixel and through a random point in the pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - number of pixels in the x axis
      nY - number of pixels in the y axis
      j - the index of the pixel in the x axis
      i - the row number of the pixel
      Returns:
      A list of rays that are being sent from the camera to the scene.

    • AverageColor

      public Color AverageColor(List<Ray> rays)
      This function takes a list of rays and returns the average color of the rays
      Parameters:
      rays - A list of rays to be traced.
      Returns:
      The average color of the rays.

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Generate a ray from camera to a middle of a given pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - - number of columns
      nY - - number of rows
      j - - the pixel index: number of column in row
      i - - the pixel index: number of row in column
      Returns:
      A ray from the camera to a given pixel

    • printGrid

      public Camera printGrid(int interval, Color color)
      Prints a grid of the specified color on the image
      Parameters:
      interval - The interval between grid lines.
      color - The color of the grid lines.
